thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Capita Says Prudential's Life, Pensions Business Administration To be Transferred From Capita

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capita Says Prudential's Life, Pensions Business Administration To be Transferred From Capita
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Capita Plc:
* PRUDENTIAL SAID ADMINISTRATION OF ITS LIFE AND PENSIONS BUSINESS TO BE TRANSFERRED FROM CAPITA TO NEW SUPPLIER ON JULY 31
* PRUDENTIAL‘S LIFE AND PENSIONS OPERATIONS EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE REVENUE OF ABOUT 80 MILLION STG TO CAPITA IN FY 2017
* ‍CAPITA WILL CONTINUE TO ADMINISTER PRUDENTIAL‘S INTERNATIONAL OPERATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
